title: Only I, a Professional Photographer, knows about the Saint’s Secret Account and Activities - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Romance   School Life   Shounen   Slice of Life
tags: Beautiful Female Lead   Cosplay   Heartwarming   Male Protagonist   Modern Day   Photography   R-15
author: Akagane Musashi   赤金武蔵
description:
I, Kudou Manabi, had been making a living earnestly as a photographer without the school’s knowledge.

Doing such activities under the name Mana, I mainly accept commissions from cosplayers and take their pictures.

At one time, I had suddenly received a commission from the up-and-coming newbie cosplayer, Towanosei.

However, on the day we were supposed to meet, the one who appeared in the studio was—

“I’m T-Towanosei! Pleased to meet yo…u…?”

—Our school’s most talented girl, whose beauty is like no other, and the girl who should’ve nothing to do with cosplaying… Towada Hijiri.>
